scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=localtest && lerna run mock && lerna run test --scope jasper-report-generator && lerna run stopmock
scripts.citest: export NODE_ENV=docker && lerna run mock && lerna run citest --scope jasper-report-generator && lerna run stopmock
scripts.docker-build-base: docker build --no-cache -t dm112/doctemplate-ci-base:latest -f Dockerfile.base . && docker push dm112/doctemplate-ci-base:0.0.1
